entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
